column5: the following questions..  #1 Name me two seminar presenters at the show on the Saturday!  #2 How any gallons of water are in the megatank??
o o o o o o o    I know   I know!!!!!
1) Dave Mercer & Pete Maina  2) 5,000 Gal.
Dave Mercer and Pete Maina  45,000 gallons !
Dave Mercer and Babe Winkelman 30, 000 gal  Hard to find the tank
I was close , but wayne beat me to it Don't you ever work   ?  TB
All day Dave... I just walked in from the shop ! Of course  I was working on my hut and my cutter ! lol
Dave Mecer and Pete Maina  60000 gal
Waynes got it.... Ill put your name on the list!!
5000  and dave mercer and pete mania, leo & ron,italo,paul powis,  But someone allready beat me too it...Man it sucks havin to work....lol...
Put my name on the "list"... was I bad!
Wayne, you can pick me up on the way down bud
LOL... I just thinkin when I can even go.. Concert Friday.. Tyler ice fishing Saturday...
Go on Monday
Seems some of the people here aren't the only ones that think the tank is 5000 gallons (?)   http://www.mississaugabassmasters.com/pdf_...mp;BoatShow.pdf

I was going by the announcement posted on OFC... that should be the bible.. LOL  A2F changed his answer 3 times... Nauti's was done without changes. Maybe they can go together if my answer is wrong ! lol
hey - I have no idea what the answer is - I just came across this thing today and noticed what they had posted on their flyer vs what I read here last night.  Enjoy the show !  )

I hope this show will be a good one. Don't want to sound negative, but still no exhibitor list on their site and no response from them after I sent an email asking them if they had a list. Bad service on their part. Having a pdf floorplan without exhibitors penciled in is kind of cheesy.
45,000 gallons does seem a bit extreme Rob. I think my 20 x 42 full L pool only holds 30,000.. but TJ said I won!!! lol

well, the 1st time around I searched... and found a generic "MEGA TANK"... and posted what they said how many gallons it has... then I realized, they can call any "LARGE" tank a "MEGA" tank... then I did a more SPECIFIC search... and found the same tank they used last year...at the FISHING SHOW (before it was closed)....
i am never around when the question gets ask lol seems like im always 2 hours behind  Cheers!
Yah... 2 hours and a DAY ! lol  Wanna go Monday?
lol to funny i didnt even look at the day lol  i think im going saturday though.  I missed last year for the first time in a long while so im looking forward to going this year  cheers!
